statusList.Name: Silence
statusList.Description: Prevents the enemy from using mana for a short duration.

statusList.Name: Poison
statusList.Description: Gradually reduces the enemy's health over time.

statusList.Name: Burn
statusList.Description: Inflicts immediate damage and additional damage over time.

statusList.Name: Freeze
statusList.Description: Reduces the enemy's ability to dodge or move quickly.

statusList.Name: Stun
statusList.Description: Temporarily incapacitates the enemy, making them unable to act.

statusList.Name: Slow
statusList.Description: Decreases the enemy's movement speed and reaction time.

statusList.Name: Heal
statusList.Description: Restores a portion of the player's health.

statusList.Name: Paralyze
statusList.Description: Completely stops the enemy's movement, rendering them unable to act.

statusList.Name: Bleed
statusList.Description: The target loses health over time due to a bleeding wound.
